Articles.Content:
There should be an apply force option in the cheat menu for testing ship integrity. It would also be quite fun to mess with. It should have a "part" input, a "rotation" input, and a force input. There should also be an ability to aim like with the shape shooting thing.

Edited March 6, 2020 by KrakenNinja

And also, maybe, if we decide to simulate that the Kerbals are trying to lift their ship upright, 
if it ever topples over after landing on the Mun, for example.
But is that how real tests are done in the membrane upstairs?
